pamanager
Class UserNotificationAgent

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--ciagent.CIAgent
        |
        +--pamanager.UserNotificationAgent
public class UserNotificationAgent
extends CIAgent
implements java.io.Serializable

The UserNotificationAgent class displays a message when an event is received.

See Also:
